subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The Australian sprinter Simon Gerrans held off a late charge by Peter Sagan to win Monday’s hilly third stage of the Tour de France in Corsica by less than half a wheel.
snippet: The Australian sprinter Simon Gerrans held off a late charge by Peter Sagan to win Monday’s hilly third stage of the Tour de France in Corsica by less than half a wheel.
